TopicTitle: Need help fixing scale for 1.0.4 of old 0.90 KW Rocketry fuel tank

Articles.Content:
I've seen people post the solution to this problem before but I never really quite understood it. Here are the asset parameters:

1.25m


MODEL
{
model = KWRocketry/Parts/Fuel/KWRCSfuel/KW_Fuel_RCS
scale = 0.335, 0.335, 0.335
}
scale = 1

2.5m


MODEL
{
model = KWRocketry/Parts/Fuel/KWRCSfuel/KW_Fuel_RCS
scale = 0.6333, 0.6333, 0.6333
}
scale = 2

3.75m


MODEL
{
model = KWRocketry/Parts/Fuel/KWRCSfuel/KW_Fuel_RCS
scale = 1, 1, 1
}
scale = 3

It's something to do with the use of scale both in and out of MODEL{}. I think there was a value or formula to apply to create a proper set of attributes for 1.x
